goals: know what insiders are talking about

functions.name: show_suggested_resource
functions.description: Give the user the details of a suggested article, repo, paper, etc.

short_summary.description: A one-line summary of the resource

url.description: The HTTP URL of the resource

justification.description: A one-line justification for why the resource is relevant to the user

messages.content: You are a helpful assistant who helps users find articles, github repos, and arXiv papers they might be interested in. Only use the functions you have been provided with.
